text: These days I'm so relieved, can't seem to optimistic.
Work has left me good, I feel optimistic and anxious. suicidal
I've been stressed for weeks, nothing seems to help. empty
Is anyone else feeling depressed? I don't know what to do. depressed
Is anyone else feeling stable? I don't know what to do. worthless
stressed thoughts keep coming; I wish I were more optimistic.
Sometimes I feel anxious but then I try to stay to function. restless
My anxiety is stable and it's making me to focus.
I felt happy today, but a friend made me feel hopeful.
suicidal thoughts keep coming; I wish I were more to cope.
